local preferences

In this part, you can set down the application local settings.

1- Language

Select one of the existing languages as your application language. Also, you can add a new language to the existing ones. This case is explained below:

How to add a new language to the existing ones

Imagine you want to add a new language named Persian. To do this, go through the following steps:

1) Click on the setting (Gear) sign at the end of 'language' row.

2) On the new page, click on the ' + ' sign next to the 'languages' in the toolbar.

3) A dialog will open. Enter a title (in our example: Persian) and a key (in our example: fa).

4) Click 'ok'. Now a new language added to languages.

5) Click on your new language. On the opened page the list of all words is shown. All these words need to be translated.

6) Do the translation step for all the words.

7) Click on 'Save' button on the page.

 

Now, if you go back to the local setting page again, you will see that the new language is added to the list of languages.

 

2- Direction

the page direction could be 'left to right' or vice versa.

3- Calendar

Selecting one of the calendars in the list, then all dates in your application will be shown based on it.

4- Date format

It Shows the format of showing dates.
